title: i aquire assistance
body:
I don't know why I cannot login to League servers, am I banned? I don't remember doing anything wrong...

I guess I have to quit league... I'm sorry for cheating I didn't know I did! It says incorrect username or password.
I reset my password, and I still get this error.
I guess I have to quit now. :(

If you could please unban me,
from the bottom of my heart.

Sincerely, Zengemhelperblue lvl 9 teddy bear king

replies.body:
And the survey saaaaaaaaays.....NOT BANNED!

No worries this account isn't banned, we're simply having some [**slight login server issues**](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na). The devs are looking into what's going on, and they should be back up shortly

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=MlrMAPTP,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2017-08-13T01:41:10.752+0000)
>
> And the survey saaaaaaaaays.....NOT BANNED!
> 
> No worries this account isn't banned, we're simply having some [**slight login server issues**](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na). The devs are looking into what's going on, and they should be back up shortly

thank god
League is my favorite game by far
Do you acquire, aquire, or require assistance?

You can calm down--we all have the same problem---server related.
Check the server status page and you will see a note

> [{quoted}](name=84mankie,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=MlrMAPTP,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-08-13T00:44:46.684+0000)
>
> You can calm down--we all have the same problem---server related.
> Check the server status page and you will see a note


Really? So I was not banned?

...maybe, if you did something wrong?
Anyhow, there are a couple of reports of people getting "invalid unsername/ password" messages alternating with "authentication server cannot be reached". Riot already wrote that they have a server issue and work on it. So, chances are good that you are off the hook
